trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" /> that displays a user-created Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" />，它显示用户创建的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类承载 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的 Direct3D 内容。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法来更改显示的 Direct3D 内容<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method to assign a Direct3D surface to a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>用于将分配到的 Direct3D 面方法<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to track updates to the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法，以跟踪更新到 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method to display the changed areas.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>方法以显示更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类管理两个显示缓冲区，称为*后台缓冲区*和*前台缓冲区*。

trans-unit.source: The back buffer is your Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 后台缓冲区是你的 Direct3D 面。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method, where it is displayed on the hardware.
trans-unit.target: 更改对后台缓冲区复制转发到前台缓冲区在调用时<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>方法，其中显示在硬件。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 有时，前台缓冲区变得不可用。

trans-unit.source: This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities.
trans-unit.target: 此缺乏可用性可能引起屏幕锁定、 全屏幕独占 Direct3D 应用程序、 用户切换或其他系统活动。

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 当发生这种情况时，通知 WPF 应用程序通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序响应前台缓冲区变得不可用的方式取决于是否启用 WPF 为回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法具有一个重载采用一个参数，指定是否 WPF 回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 不会回退到软件呈现时进行响应到不可用前缓冲区

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> overload or call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>重载或调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`false`，当前台缓冲区变得不可用，并且执行任何操作时，呈现系统释放其对后台缓冲区的引用显示。

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: 呈现系统前台缓冲区再次可用时，将引发<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件以通知你的 WPF 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件重新启动再次与有效的 Direct3D 面呈现。

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启动呈现，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 回退回软件呈现时进行响应到不可用前缓冲区

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> when the front buffer is available again.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`true`，呈现系统保留它对后台缓冲区的引用时前台缓冲区变得不可用，因此无需调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>时前面缓冲区重新变为可用。

trans-unit.source: There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 可能有用户的设备变得不可用的情况。

trans-unit.source: When that occurs, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 当发生这种情况时，调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>来释放对后台缓冲区的 WPF 的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you need to reset your device, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要重置你的设备，调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>与`backBuffer`参数设置为`null`，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>试`backBuffer`设置为有效的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 性能极大地取决于 Direct3D 面的设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互操作性的性能注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类时不显示 Direct3D 内容 WPF 呈现在软件中，例如通过远程桌面连接，除非调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>并指定`true`为`enableSoftwareFallback`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何声明<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>在 XAML 中。

trans-unit.source: You must map the <xref:System.Windows.Interop> namespace, because it is not included in the default XAML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 必须映射<xref:System.Windows.Interop>命名空间，因为它不包含默认 XAML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default display resolution is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: 默认显示分辨率为 1/96 英寸。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The display resolution on the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 显示分辨率位于 x 轴上。

trans-unit.source: The display resolution on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 显示分辨率位于 y 轴上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> class with the specified display resolution.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的显示分辨率初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default display resolution is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: 默认显示分辨率为 1/96 英寸。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dpiX" /> or <paramref name="dpiY" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dpiX" /> 或 <paramref name="dpiY" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> that represents the area that changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />，表示已更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the area of the back buffer that changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定后台缓冲区已更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法，以指示你的代码对后台缓冲区所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: To be rendered, the changed area on the back buffer must have a corresponding changed area on the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>.
trans-unit.target: 要呈现在后台缓冲区的更改的区域必须具有相应的更改的区域<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> methods before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method to copy the changed areas to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>方法以到前台缓冲区中复制更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: After a few calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method, the changed areas are merged into a single area.
trans-unit.target: 后几调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法，更改的区域将合并到单个区域。

trans-unit.source: This means you must have valid data outside of the changed areas.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你必须具有更改的区域之外的有效数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to specify the changed region in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法，以指定后台缓冲区中的已更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock(System.Windows.Duration)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock(System.Windows.Duration)" /> 方法的调用未锁定位图。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The back buffer has not been assigned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer(System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType,System.IntPtr)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer(System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType,System.IntPtr)" /> 方法分配后台缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: 存在下列一种或多种情况时。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dirtyRect.X" /> < 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dirtyRect.X" /> < 0

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dirtyRect.Y" /> < 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dirtyRect.Y" /> < 0

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dirtyRect.Width" /> < 0 or <paramref name="dirtyRect.Width" /> > <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth" /><paramref name="dirtyRect.Height" /> < 0 or <paramref name="dirtyRect.Height" /> > <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dirtyRect.Width" />< 0 或 <paramref name="dirtyRect.Width" /> > <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth" /><paramref name="dirtyRect.Height" /> < 0 或 <paramref name="dirtyRect.Height" /> > <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight" />

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法复制资源引用和数据绑定（它们可能不再解析），而不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值使该实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的克隆（深层复制）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前属性值使该实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的可修改克隆（深层复制）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a software copy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的软件副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is a software copy of the current state of the back buffer; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the back buffer cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，它是后台缓冲区当前状态的软件副本；否则，如果无法读取后台缓冲区，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A> method is called by clients such as the printing system and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.RenderTargetBitmap> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A>例如打印系统的客户端通过调用方法和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.RenderTargetBitmap>类。

trans-unit.source: Optionally override the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A> method to implement custom logic and return a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 重写<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A>方法来实现自定义逻辑，并返回不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can return a placeholder <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> if the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A> implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以返回一个占位符<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>如果默认值<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CopyBackBuffer%2A>实现返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class, you must override the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to enable correct cloning.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类，必须重写<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.CreateInstanceCore%2A>方法可实现正确的克隆。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation performs a `return new D3DImage()`, which will not be correct if the instance is a different class.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将执行`return new D3DImage()`，这将不正确，如果实例是另一个类。

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在通过垃圾回收回收 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 之前，释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 没有作用。

trans-unit.source: Makes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 成为不可修改的，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class does not allow freezing because changes are always possible due to front buffer availability.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类不允许冻结因为更改始终是可能由于前台缓冲区可用性。

trans-unit.source: The instance to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的实例。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的冻结复本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要复制和冻结的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使当前实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的冻结复本。

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则复制其当前的动画值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in measure units.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的高度（采用度量单位）。

trans-unit.source: A measure unit is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: 度量单位为 1/96 英寸。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Height%2A> can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Height%2A>时通过调用分配新的后台缓冲区，可更改<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a front buffer exists.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示前台缓冲区是否存在。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a front buffer exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在前台缓冲区，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 有时，前台缓冲区变得不可用。

trans-unit.source: This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities.
trans-unit.target: 此缺乏可用性可能引起屏幕锁定、 全屏幕独占 Direct3D 应用程序、 用户切换或其他系统活动。

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 当发生这种情况时，通知 WPF 应用程序通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序响应前台缓冲区变得不可用的方式取决于是否启用 WPF 为回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法具有一个重载采用一个参数，指定是否 WPF 回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的备注部分<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to check the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable%2A> property when rendering the composition target.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检查<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable%2A>属性在呈现组合目标时。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> to be notified when the status of the front buffer changes.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>前台缓冲区的状态更改时接收通知。

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序响应前台缓冲区变得不可用的方式取决于是否启用 WPF 为回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法具有一个重载采用一个参数，指定是否 WPF 回退到软件呈现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的备注部分<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Locks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> and enables operations on the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 锁定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 并允许对后台缓冲区进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method to change the back buffer by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法可以通过调用更改后台缓冲区<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is locked, your application can also render to the Direct3D surface assigned to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>是锁定，你的应用程序也可呈现到分配给后台缓冲区的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method blocks when the rendering system is reading the back buffer to update the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法将一直阻塞时呈现系统读取后台缓冲区，以更新前的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock%2A> method to avoid blocking indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock%2A>方法来避免无限期阻止。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method to enable updates to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法以启用对后台缓冲区的更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The lock count equals <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 锁计数等于 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata associated with the image source.
trans-unit.target: 获取与图像源关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight%2A> can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight%2A>时通过调用分配新的后台缓冲区，可更改<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight%2A> property to specify the changed region in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelHeight%2A>属性来指定后台缓冲区中已更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth%2A> can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth%2A>时通过调用分配新的后台缓冲区，可更改<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth%2A> property to specify the changed region in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.PixelWidth%2A>属性来指定后台缓冲区中已更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 分配 Direct3D 图面作为后台缓冲区的源。

trans-unit.source: The type of Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 图面的类型。

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />。

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要作为后台缓冲区分配的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 分配 Direct3D 图面作为后台缓冲区的源。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method to assign a Direct3D surface to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法要分配给后台缓冲区的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 性能极大地取决于 Direct3D 面的设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互操作性的性能注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> overload is identical to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>重载等同于调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> or call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>或调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`false`，呈现系统释放其对后台缓冲区的引用，当前台缓冲区变得不可用，并且将不会显示。

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: 呈现系统前台缓冲区再次可用时，将引发<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件以通知你的 WPF 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件重新启动再次与有效的 Direct3D 面呈现。

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启动呈现，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示了所需的后台缓冲区设置`IDirect3DSurface9`类型。

trans-unit.source: `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8`
trans-unit.target: `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8`

trans-unit.source: Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.
trans-unit.target: 上允许多级采样`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`仅呈现。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method to assign a Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>用于将分配 Direct3D 面方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> has not been locked by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock(System.Windows.Duration)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock" /> 方法的调用未锁定 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock(System.Windows.Duration)" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="backBufferType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="backBufferType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />。

trans-unit.source: The creation parameters for <paramref name="backBuffer" /> do not meet the requirements for the <paramref name="backBufferType" />-or-The <paramref name="backBuffer" /> device is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="backBuffer" /> 的创建参数不符合 <paramref name="backBufferType" /> 的要求或 <paramref name="backBuffer" /> 设备无效。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The type of Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 图面的类型。

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType" />。

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要作为后台缓冲区分配的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to fall back on software rendering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 退回软件呈现，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 分配 Direct3D 图面作为后台缓冲区的源。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> overload or call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>重载或调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`false`，当前台缓冲区变得不可用，并且执行任何操作时，呈现系统释放其对后台缓冲区的引用显示。

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: 呈现系统前台缓冲区再次可用时，将引发<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件以通知你的 WPF 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>事件重新启动再次与有效的 Direct3D 面呈现。

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启动呈现，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> when the front buffer is available again.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`true`，呈现系统保留它对后台缓冲区的引用时前台缓冲区变得不可用，因此无需调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>前台缓冲区时可用试。

trans-unit.source: There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 可能有用户的设备变得不可用的情况。

trans-unit.source: When that occurs, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: 当发生这种情况时，调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>来释放对后台缓冲区的 WPF 的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you need to reset your device, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> with `backBuffer` set to `null`, and then call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要重置你的设备，调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>与`backBuffer`设置为`null`，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>试`backBuffer`设置为有效的 Direct3D 图面。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示了所需的后台缓冲区设置`IDirect3DSurface9`类型。

trans-unit.source: `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8`
trans-unit.target: `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8`

trans-unit.source: Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.
trans-unit.target: 上允许多级采样`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`仅呈现。

trans-unit.source: The duration to wait for the lock to be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 获得锁定之前要等待的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to lock the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> and waits for the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 尝试锁定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 并等待指定的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the lock was acquired; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果获得锁定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <paramref name="timeout" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: The lock count equals <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 锁计数等于 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the lock count for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的锁计数递减。

trans-unit.source: When the lock count for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> reaches zero, the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is fully unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 当的锁计数<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>达到零时，<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>将完全取消锁定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>标记用于呈现如果映像已更改为以前的调用由指定的区域<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: 当在提交更改并进行呈现后，其他调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>方法阻止，直到呈现线程具有后台缓冲区的内容复制到前台缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing.
trans-unit.target: 此同步可避免显示项目，比如撕裂。

trans-unit.source: Do not update the Direct3D surface while the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 未更新时的 Direct3D 面<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>处于解除锁定状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method to copy the updated back buffer to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>方法将更新的后台缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />, in measure units.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> 的宽度（采用度量单位）。

trans-unit.source: A measure unit is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: 度量单位为 1/96 英寸。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Width%2A> can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Width%2A>时通过调用分配新的后台缓冲区，可更改<xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>方法。
